remarks: Relation between a topological closure and a symmetric entourage in an uniform space.  Second part of proposition 2 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.4.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jan-2018.)
statement:
utoptop.1 $e |- J = ( unifTop ` U ) $.
utop3cls $p |- ( ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ M C_ ( X X. X ) ) /\ ( V e. U /\ `' V = V ) ) -> ( ( cls ` ( J tX J ) ) ` M ) C_ ( V o. ( M o. V ) ) ) $.
